commits.author: alice-dev
commits.commit_message: Fix typo in README and update setup instructions
commits.codediff:
--- a/README.md
+++ b/README.md
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@
-Instal the dependencies using pip
+Install the dependencies using pip

 python3 -m venv venv
 source venv/bin/activate

commits.author: bob-backend
commits.codediff:
--- a/app/routes/auth.py
+++ b/app/routes/auth.py
@@ -1,5 +1,42 @@
+@router.post('/login')
+def login(user: LoginSchema):
+    db_user = get_user(user.email)
+    if not verify_password(user.password, db_user.password):
+        raise HTTPException(status_code=401)
+    return create_jwt(db_user.id)

commits.author: bob-backend
commits.commit_message: Refactor auth middleware and improve error handling
commits.codediff:
--- a/app/middleware/auth.py
+++ b/app/middleware/auth.py
@@ -18,9 +18,15 @@
- user = decode_token(token)
- if not user:
-     return Response(status_code=401)
+ try:
+     user = decode_token(token)
+ except TokenExpiredError:
+     raise HTTPException(status_code=401, detail='Token expired')

commits.author: charlie-frontend
commits.commit_message: Create dashboard UI with role-based views

commits.author: charlie-frontend
commits.commit_message: Optimize dashboard performance and lazy load components
commits.codediff:
--- a/src/components/Dashboard.jsx
+++ b/src/components/Dashboard.jsx
@@ -3,4 +3,6 @@
-import AdminDashboard from './AdminDashboard'
+const AdminDashboard = React.lazy(() => import('./AdminDashboard'))

commits.author: diana-ml
commits.commit_message: Add ML-based workload contribution scoring model
commits.codediff:
--- a/ml/model.py
+++ b/ml/model.py
@@ -1,3 +1,18 @@
+class ContributionModel(nn.Module):
+    def __init__(self):
+        super().__init__()
+        self.fc1 = nn.Linear(12, 64)
+        self.fc2 = nn.Linear(64, 1)
